description: Converts an output to valid JSON format

input_variables.name: kql_query
input_variables.description: The KQL generated from the log message

input_variables.name: source_file
input_variables.description: The filename of the original log message

input_variables.name: date
input_variables.description: Current date and time in ISO format

input_variables.name: status_message
input_variables.description: Whether the query was executed successfully or not

input_variables.name: probability_score
input_variables.description: The probability score of the query generated by the model
